result.execSummary:
The defendant Randy T Villanueva was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Child Enticement-Sexual Contact, a class D felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.07(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Must follow all rules of Probation. Must report to Probation today (11/29/2016).
Concurrent with: Other sentence

miscConds.notes: $290.60 fine/costs to be paid to Probation while on Probation. Failure to pay will be civil judgment.

Must provide DNA sample and pay the $250.00 DNA surcharge to Probation while on Probation. Failure to pay will be civil judgment.   Defendant may request expungement of the DNA sample under Wis. Stat. 165.77(4) by petitioning the Wisconsin Department of Justice. Expungement of DNA is NOT a court process. 
For information see: http://www.doj.state.wi.us/dles/crime-labs/clb-forms.
May not possess or use firearms or body armor.

If not a U.S. Citizen, may face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights. Cannot vote until civil rights are restored. Cannot hold elective office until civil rights are restored. No contact with victim, may be modified through Probation.
Must follow through with sexual deviancy programming. Mandatory sex offender registry - lifetime registration required.

timeConds.notes:
Banked for use by Probation Agent if necessary. Subject to work release. Not subject to good time.
**Per Court Order on 6/8/17, 9 months of conditional jail time released for use by Probation beginning May 5, 2017.  Subject to Work Release.  NOT subject to Good time.  May serve time in another county as long as there is no cost to Polk County**

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

superMiscConds.notes: May not possess or use firearms and, if considered a violent felony, no body armor.
Not to have contact with minors under the age of 17 unless supervised or approved by DOC in advance.

Must follow rules of supervision.
Cannot vote until civil rights restored, cannot hold elected office, other civil rights may be lost until restored. If not a US citizen, may face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights.  

All outstanding financial obligations are to be paid through the Department of Corrections while on supervision. Failure to pay during supervision will result in a civil judgment and subject to tax intercept and/or other collection efforts.

supervisions.notes: Lifetime registration on the Sex Offender Registry required.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Sentencing After Revocation - January 29, 2019

Defendant Randy T Villanueva in court with attorney Dan Firkus.  Defendant Randy T Villanueva in custody.  Jeffrey Lawrence Kemp appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 11:54 am.  
CT finds not elig for CIP or SA pgm.  WSP 10 yr, 5 yr IC, 5 yr ES.  NC with minors under the age of 17 unless supervised or ok'd by DOC in advance.  Follow rules of ES.  Order lifetime SO registry, previously ordered.  514 days credit.  $540.60 still owing, to be paid during supervision, ftp-judgment.  May not possess or use firearms and, if considered a violent felony, no body armor.  Cannot vote until civil rights restored, cannot hold elected office, other civil rights may be lost until restored. If not a US citizen, may face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights.  PCR.  12:36 pm adj.
Dan Firkus

CT orders mandatory SO registry-lifetime registration requirement.  
w/h, probation 8 yrs, concurrent w/ other sentence.  I&S 1 yr CT, subj to WR no GT.  No contact w/ victim, may be modified thru probation.  DNA sample, $250 surcharge.  $290.60 - payable thru probation.  If unpaid at end of probation-reduced to civil judgment.  Continue to f/u on sexual deviancy programming & follow rules of probation.  No sentence credit.  Must report to probation.
